location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of John Wedderburn's circular letter of 30 July 1821, which included a form to be furnished in cases where a bill is to be drawn either on the Government of Fort William, on the Government of Fort Saint George or on the Government of Bombay.
